summary: Fully remote postion in Splunk where I've been working on custom Splunk's Apps for clients in automotive and energetic industries
highlights: 60% Front End Javascript + SplunkJS (Developing Splunk's apps)
30% Splunk Search and Configuration
10% Splunk Python's Backend (Custom search commands)
Long term project of tracking key production statistics of 2020 electric vehicle
Long term project of IT tickets tracking app using custom force directed visualization for leader in automotive industry
Continously worked on internal Splunk's app development focused on energetic management following ISO 50001 standard

work.summary: Self-founded company for all other IT and Marketing projects (personal and commercial)

Most notable personal project WOD Time Calculator (more in projects)
Web apps in Vue.js (with MongoDB)
Blogs in Jekyll or Wordpress
Online shops in PrestaShop and WooCommerce
iOS apps in Swift

Online marketing - focus on content marketing and newsletters
Social media marketing - focus on Instagram and Facebook sales boosts

work.summary: After years of working on my own I accepted offer for full-time software developer job to learn to work with team and find out more about new technologies
highlights: Learned about JavaScript testing with Jest and Mocha
Greatly improved my git skills
Worked on a few internal Node.js apps
Build CI/CD in GitLab for internal apps
Experienced working with Jenkins, React, GraphQL, SCSS, Pug and more
Learned to use several frameworks in Python like Behave and Selenium
Build several end-to-end tests for Avast in Python
